text: Arau yetiya sihamtaka koraa haya, ‘allahe yi aratirna karaiche tara prati tomaloke imana ana’, sihamte kaya, ‘amara prati yi nayila haiche ami kerala tara pratihe imana ano’. Athaca sihamte iyara bahirae yi ache se'i sakalo asbikara karae, yadi'o seya satya arau sihamtara ocarata yi ache tara satyayanakarai. Koraa, ‘yadi tomaloke mumina tente tomaloke atitata kiya allahara nabisakalaka hatya karaichila?’
